about.title: Introduction to {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a high-performance library for full-text search and document indexing. It supports 70+ file types, including PDF, Word, Excel, images, and ZIP archives, ensuring fast and accurate results.

more_features.title: Advanced search & indexing capabilities
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides powerful text search and indexing tools across 70+ document formats, making it easy to find and organize information.

feature_1.title: Comprehensive text search
feature_1.content: Locate text in multiple document types, including PDFs, Word files, and spreadsheets. Use exact matches, fuzzy search, and wildcards for refined results.

feature_2.title: Efficient indexing for large data
feature_2.content: Speed up searches by creating structured indexes, making it easier to retrieve information from large document collections.

feature_3.title: Supports 80+ languages
feature_3.content: Search across documents in different languages, with automatic recognition of various word forms and keyboard layouts.

feature_4.title: Custom search settings
feature_4.content: Adjust search options such as case sensitivity, date filters, and word exclusions to get precise results.

formats.title: Search in a variety of documents
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} works with over 70 file formats, including office documents, ensuring quick and accurate searches with indexing support.

operations.title: Explore key features
operations.description: Discover high-speed search features designed to enhance efficiency and accuracy.
